summary: User timeline_12 documents a journey through depression and anxiety, showing gradual progress with therapy and medication.

posts.text: Everything feels impossible. I'm broken beyond repair I'm worthless. I haven't showered in a week Did one small thing today - made my bed. wrote in my journal Trying to celebrate tiny victories. I'm being patient with myself
maladaptive_evidence: I haven't showered in a week
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. I'm tired of existing I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I've been drinking to cope But I've been practicing the breathing exercises went for a walk to clear my head and it's starting to help. I'm worth the effort
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I've been isolating myself from everyone. Nothing will ever get better I can't see a future for myself But today I reached out to an old friend went for a walk to clear my head and we made plans to meet up. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
Recovery is a journey, not a destination
maladaptive_evidence: I can't see a future for myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Side effects are awful. I want to give up on everything I'm completely numb Sticking with it because my doctor said it takes time. wrote in my journal Noticing small improvements in my mood. I'm learning healthier coping skills
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Haven't left my apartment in days. Nothing will ever get better I isolated myself from all my friends Forced myself to go for a walk today started going to therapy and called my sister. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thinking about stopping my meds. I'm tired of existing I'm spiraling out of control Called my psychiatrist first. reached out for help We're trying a different medication instead. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: Taking it one day at a time
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Side effects are awful. Life is meaningless I hurt myself again Sticking with it because my doctor said it takes time. joined a support group Noticing small improvements in my mood. I'm being patient with myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Side effects are awful. I'm tired of existing I'm completely numb Sticking with it because my doctor said it takes time. reached out to my therapist Noticing small improvements in my mood. I'm building a support system
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. I have no reason to keep going I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I stopped taking my medication But I've been practicing the breathing exercises joined a support group and it's starting to help. I'm learning healthier coping skills
maladaptive_evidence: I have no reason to keep going
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I relapsed again last night. I feel empty inside I hate myself for it. I isolated myself from all my friends Called my therapist this morning talked to a friend about what I'm going through and we talked through it. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
I'm learning to be kinder to myself
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
